column4: I have a DRAM-memory-chip that I suspect is faulty... what is a good app to "test" the memory if I put it in to see that it is working correctly? some kind of benchmark app?
the boot menus for most live cd's hage a memtest option. as does ubuntus default grub
it runs BEFOR the system boots.. its a special grub command/entry
well it runs runs befor the main os boots. :)
